craftedMods: 30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect

items.name: Apocalypse Stinger
implicitMods: Enemies you Kill have a 15% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Physical Damage
craftedMods: Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers
+18% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.
explicitMods: Buff grants +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while holding a Shield
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that multiplies damage over time and increases skill effect duration of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 20% more Damage over Time
You and nearby allies have 19% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
15% of Damage Taken from Hits is Leeched as Life during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 10% increased Damage
Recover 3% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

items.name: Berek's Respite
explicitMods: Adds 24 to 48 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy
flavourText: Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains

items.name: Grim Ward
implicitMods: Recover 5% of Life when you Block

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a portal to the current area's town.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Monsters from the Breach do not grant Experience or drop Items
hybrid.secDescrText: Creates a breach, making you vulnerable to its powerful inhabitants.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
100% chance to Trigger Supported Non-Minion Spells on Death
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Effervescent Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods:
Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 8 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 8 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Viper Claw
implicitMods: Inflict Fire Exposure on Hit, applying -12% to Fire Resistance
Ignites you inflict spread to other Enemies within 1.3 metres
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 28 Lightning Damage to Attacks

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect

Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
